{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Scream | class = HereticSoundSequence1 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1200 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence1</u>
Plays sound sequence number 0 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence1</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 0 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Scream environment 0 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playuntildone world/amb1 end
